inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: able to read and understand English

inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: HIV infected on stable ART regimen for 5 months or greater

inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: documented CD4 count >200 within 3 months of entry visit

inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: using at least two reliable methods of contraception

inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: ability and willingness to provide informed consent

exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: History of coronary artery disease, atherosclerotic disease, left ventricular hypertrophy, cardiomegaly, syncope, congestive heart failure, myocardial infarction, pacemaker, clinically significant arrhythmia, angina, history of treatment for arrhythmia
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient is a 42 year-old postmenopausal woman with a history of breast cancer and HIV. She has been on stable ART regimen for over 5 months and has a documented CD4 count >200 within the past 3 months.
